title: NATO leaves door open for troops to remain in Afghanistan
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer - Today 
NATO is leaving the door open for a larger security force in Afghanistan than initially planned after 2016. … Click to Continue »... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
